story:
Help! Unexpected Degree Show catalogue Invoice!


  • We are the committee treasurers for the Wimbledon College of Art Degree Show - specifically Chloe Spicer and Rose Parker. Hello again!
  • Unfortunately, our catalogues cost approx £2000 more than we had budgeted for. This happened due to a miscommunication between our committee and the catalogue printers. The committee have already raised a large amount of this surplus with a refund from our beer suppliers but this still leaves us about £850 short which must be paid. 

  • We all had a fantastic degree show, and worked so hard to fundraise during 2015 - although largely we relied on the kind sponsorship from the Dean and college partners which meant that 2015 students only had to pay £30 each for the degree show - rather than the £100 from the year before. We are now asking each student to donate a little something extra. if 85 students donated £10 we'd be sorted, if 30 donated £30 we could be finished in a day.

  • If we aren't able to raise this money to pay the printers there's a real risk the amount owning could raise with interest - and ultimately the printers could choose to take us to the small claims court. So please pay as much as you can afford so we can pay this off quickly!


What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We need £850 to go straight to Evolution Printers, and commission which goes to indiegogo (this website) plus a 3%+ charge for credit card payments, which is why we are asking for £900.
  • Perks include a warm fuzzy feeling, not seeing us go to jail and feeling that you've played your part. Plus, tea and chocolate, if you want to come and visit Chloe at Merton Abbey Mills sometime! (disclaimer - we're not really going to jail)

    • If we don't reach the full amount, all the money will raised will still go to the printers, and we'll have to find another way to raise the rest of the money. Be assured that every pound you pay will help us!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that for some students this summer has been very difficult financially, but please pay as much as you can afford to help.

If you really haven't a penny in the world - please help to get the word out to other students on Facebook, and if you have any further suggestions of how to help please get in touch!

  • Thank you so much, and good luck with all your amazing careers 
Chloe and Rose

story:
UPDATE

The $1571 raised by the campaign covered one sixth of the budget of the Spring Camp, thus it has greatly contributed to the success of the project. The Spring Camp was organized in Baja from 29th March 2015 to 5th April 2015. During this period 151, mainly underprivileged highschool students took part in 40 hours of interactive lectures and small group tuition. Following the lectures students could relax on several sport programs (football, aerobic), lectures with alternative topics and playful team building competitive games. These events formed the participating students into one friendly group. According to the questionnaire filled by the students at the end of the camp the voluntary teachers professional preparation reached 4,89 and the atmosphere of the extra activities reached 4,91 on a scale of 5. The tuition, the participation on the programs, the accommodation and the three meals per day was financed by the Studium Generale for every student, thus ensuring equal opportunities. During the project 98% of the students got applied to a high level educational institution and 76% started their high level education in the institution where they applied on the first place. We would like to express our gratitude to all donors, without them our camp could not have been organised. 

Thank you! 



Short Summary

Please help us shape Hungary’s future, so that we can give the chance to underprivileged high school students to participate in our Spring Camp, which is aimed at preparing them to gain admission to higher education!  

Our mission since 1970

This organization of ours, Studium Generale is a non-profit foundation in Hungary, Central Europe, and involves 141 young volunteers, who participate in the work of the organization without pay or compensation. We prepare annually 2000 underprivileged high school students for their Matura exam in the subjects of mathematics, history and economics.

Tuition takes place for graduate and high school students on Saturdays in the form of three- or four-hour long seminars from October to May. The course is also available online to those who live in the countryside and can’t afford to participate in the seminars in Budapest due to financial and/or other limitations.

Besides regular tuition, we also offer additional opportunities for students to enhance their knowledge and prepare for their exam. For example, on 4-5 occasions annually students have the opportunity to take a mock exam, and on the National Mock Exam Day mock exams are held in five different venues throughout the country, so students all over Hungary have the opportunity to test themselves in any given subject. One week prior to the Matura exam, an intensive final preparatory event is organized spanning three days to ensure students are fully prepared for their final exam.

How we prepare high school students in the most efficient way - Spring Camp

Besides the year-long seminars and the online course, every spring and summer we organize a week-long preparatory camp free of charge. 151 students are taught by 49 teachers for 44 hours in 7 days, between 29th March and 5th April in 2015, this is our Spring Camp. 2 young volunteers teach in all of the 24 groups of 5-7 students, which makes the courses more personal and customized to certain needs of the kids. The preparatory course focuses on the repetition, the systematization of the core material and the practice and learning of the methodological knowledge. We also provide mock exams during the camp, so that our students can learn, how to take exams. On the other side, afternoon programs, evening activities, team-building games and various sport activities enhance the students’ mood and help them integrate and give them a break from a long and tiring day of studying. Due to the small age difference, students usually aren’t afraid to ask the tutors for help and tips in any subject.

The students

The main beneficiaries of the organization’s activity are high school students, who will take their Matura exam, find their future important and want to gain admission to higher education by performing during the finals better. Due to the fact that the preparatory courses, camps and programs are free of charge, these are accessible for underprivileged students helping them not lag behind their more privileged peers.

The course welcomes everyone irrespective of financial or ethnical background.

The impact of our Spring Camp

Short-term goals

  • providing an intensive and free of charge course for underprivileged students to prepare them for their Matura exam
  • helping the learning process of our students, deepening their knowledge, giving them practical skills
  • giving a brighter future prospect and career guidance
  • social integration and personality development by giving the chance to participate in our camp

Long-term goals

  • improving the chances of underprivileged young adults to gain admission to higher education by helping them apply for state scholarship during their studies and to graduate
  • increasing equality between the underprivileged and more privileged students
  • making the importance of the civil activity in the field of education become popular
  • supporting families from deprived areas directly, helping the kids reach higher income levels and better living conditions in the future

Project plan

Our project requires a lot of time to plan and to organize every detail of the camp, so that we can reach our main goals. The main planning phase began in December 2014 and the development of the details lasts approximately until the end of February 2015, when the whole project plan, marketing plan and the most important factors like accommodation and catering have to be organized. February is the month of the main marketing activities and of the application to the camp. During March the program plan and the educational materials have to be elaborated and all learning and sports supplies have to be bought. 

The camp takes place between 29th March and 5th April.

Where our funds go

Organizing a camp, where daily education takes place among a lot of different kinds of team-building games and other programs, requires a high amount of capital. In the following you can see the details of some of our main expenses.

  • Providing accommodation for one person for an entire week costs 50$, which means that we need 10.000$ for 200 campers.
  • One day of meals for a camper costs 5$, seven days of meals for 200 campers requires 7.000$.
  • To buy supplies for educational purposes and sports activities 10$ are needed for one camper, so we need 2.000$ for 200 ones.
  • Renting 24 classrooms during the week-long camp costs 1000$

Why we need donation. Why we need your help.

Due to the fact, that our organization is based on a non-profit foundation, donations and support through tenders play a vital role in sustaining our activity. The main goal, tuition, requires financial backing every year as the costs of hosting camps also require a large amount of capital. Our goal is to maintain our current status, thus giving opportunity for high school students, particularly underprivileged ones, to participate in our programs, events and courses completely free of charge, and helping them prepare for their Matura exam and gain admission to their chosen university.

What we can’t do without your help

The Spring Camp, scheduled to be held in March 2015, requires 20000$ to be organized, and we are currently 10000$ short of it. We ask you, if there is an opportunity, to support our organization, so that we can help shape Hungary’s future furthermore.
In case we will not be able to raise enough money, we will have to decrease the number of the participants, so we could give the chance to fewer kids to develop their knowledge.
It could also happen that we will not be able to organize the camp, then we will organize a smaller camp in summer by using the money raised so far and raising more money furthermore.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to give us financial support, it does not mean, that you are not of great help to us. Share our message on different kinds of platforms, social media networks like Facebook or Twitter or send our campaign to your friends via e-mail, so that our mission can be heard by many people, who might be able to afford to donate. All kinds of support will help us get closer to our main goals!

Rewards

We would highly appreciate, if you could support us, that is why we also want to give you customized rewards that can remind you about what a great thing you have done. 

Pay a camper to attend class for one day

  • A warm, fuzzy feeling in your heart, and a HUGE heartfelt thank from the Spring Camp. Every little help counts!
  • We'll tweet out our thanks and mention you on our Facebook page 
  • We'll send you a digital thank you card about what you have contributed to, which you can print and hang out in your office/home

Feed a camper for a whole day

  • All of the above+
  • We'll send you a collection of pictures and videos of the camp
  • We'll thank you in a special thank-you list on our website

Help us stock our classrooms with learning and sport supplies for a camper

  • All of the above+
  • You'll receive a thank you postcard with the photo of the campers

Feed 5 campers for a whole day

  • All of the above+
  • Your name will be written on huge supporter placard hanging in the community hall of the Spring Camp

Provide lodging for one camper for the duration of camp on a bunk bed

  • All of the above+
  • You'll get a personalized THANK YOU photo of the student you supported
  • We'll send you a Studium Generale good luck bracelet

Pay the entire camp cost for a camper for a week

  • All of the above+
  • You'll receive a limited edition Spring Camp t-shirt that the volunteers wear with the unique design and logo of the camp
  • You'll receive a personal letter from the student you supported describing his/her experiences at the Camp

Provide 6 classrooms  for the week for our daily classes

  • All of the above+
  • Bronze Level Sponzorship acknowledgement for you or your company on our website's sponzors page including a link and a logo
  • You will be the sponsor of these 6 classes, and your name will be written on the doors of classrooms
  • We'll send you a presonalized engraved pen

Provide lodging for 10 campers for the duration of camp on bunk beds

  • All of the above+
  • Silver Level Sponzorship acknowledgement for you or your company on our website's sponzors page including a link and a logo
  • We'll send you a personalized video of the 10 students supported, so you can see them thank you personally
  • You can meet the President of Studium Generale and our Team over a private dinner or on skype

Provide 3 meals a day for all campers for the duration of camp

  • All of the above+
  • Gold Level Sponzorship acknowledgement for you or your company on our website's sponzors page including a link and a logo 
  • We will display your name or logo as a sponsor of the pitch session on the last day of camp 
  • Your logo will also be featured on camp materials including shirts, posters, media releases and social media 
  • You'll get a special invitation to visit the Spring Camp for a day in March 2015
  • We'll love you forever

Help financing all learning and sport supplies needed for all campers

  • All of the above+
  • Platinum Level Sponzorship acknowledgement for you or your company on our website's sponzors page including a link and a logo 
  • We will name the Spring Camp's cummunity hall after you
  • We'll love you forever and ever



FAQ
If you have any questions, please contact us via email: info@studiumgenerale.hu

What are the results of our work that can confirm our expertise and efficiency?

90% of those who participate in our camp will gain admission to higher education. 80% of them can get into a certain university or college, which they mark as first choice and more than 70% of them will be able to study at the Corvinus University of Budapest.

Where can I get more information about the organization?

About the renowned and prestigious organization of Studium Generale you can get more information on the following website: www.studiumgenerale.hu.

Why is such a preparatory course needed to pass the Matura exam?

The preparatory course of Studium Generale is needed, because there are huge differences between the high schools in Hungary according to their financial background and the standards of education. That is why students studying in poorer high schools that offer a lower standard of education cannot acquire the knowledge or skills that are needed to pass their Matura exam successfully to gain admission to higher education. 

Who are the young volunteers?

The whole organization involves 141 volunteers, who study at the Corvinus University of Budapest. They spend their weekends and free time on teaching students without pay or compensation. They are not qualified experts, but they have all achieved great results in the field of mathematics, history and economics, so they all know what the target group needs to do to pass the exams successfully.

How can students participate in our camp?

The students are ranked according to their performance during the preparatory course, motivation and the results of their mock exams taken during the year. From the 300-400 children 150 can participate in the camp.

Other Ways You Can Help
If
you are not able to give us financial support, it does not mean, that you are
not of great help to us. Share our message on different kinds of platforms, social media networks like Facebook or
Twitter or send our campaign to your friends via e-mail, so that our mission can be heard by many people, who
might be able to afford to donate. All kinds of support will help us get closer
to our main goals!
Rewards
We would highly appreciate, if you could support us, that is why we also want to give
you customized rewards that can remind you about what a great thing you have
done. Pay a camper to attend class for one day

A warm, fuzzy feeling in your heart, and a HUGE heartfelt thank from the Spring Camp. Every little help counts!


We'll tweet out our thanks and mention you on our Facebook page 


We'll send you a digital thank you card about what you have contributed to, which you can print and hang out in your office/home


Feed a camper for a whole day

All of the above+


We'll send you a collection of pictures and videos of the camp


We'll thank you in a special thank-you list on our website


Help us stock our classrooms with learning and sport supplies for a camper
All of the above+


You'll receive a thank you postcard with the photo of the campers

Feed 5 campers for a whole day
All of the above+


Your name will be written on huge supporter placard hanging in the community hall of the Spring Camp

Provide lodging for one camper for the duration of camp on a bunk bed
All of the above+


You'll get a personalized THANK YOU photo of the student you supported


We'll send you a Studium Generale good luck bracelet




Pay the entire camp cost for a camper for a week


All of the above+


You'll receive a limited edition Spring Camp t-shirt that the volunteers wear with the unique design and logo of the camp


You'll receive a personal letter from the student you supported describing his/her experiences at the Camp





Provide 6 classrooms  for the week for our daily classes


All of the above+


Bronze Level Sponzorship acknowledgement for you or your company on our website's sponzors page including a link and a logo


You will be the sponsor of these 6 classes, and your name will be written on the doors of classrooms


We'll send you a presonalized engraved pen





Provide lodging for 10 campers for the duration of camp on bunk beds


All of the above+


Silver Level Sponzorship acknowledgement for you or your company on our website's sponzors page including a link and a logo


We'll send you a personalized video of the 10 students supported, so you can see them thank you personally


You can meet the President of Studium Generale and our Team over a private dinner or on skype





Provide 3 meals a day for all campers for the duration of camp


All of the above+


Gold Level Sponzorship acknowledgement for you or your company on our website's sponzors page including a link and a logo 


We will display your name or logo as a sponsor of the pitch session on the last day of camp 


Your logo will also be featured on camp materials including shirts, posters, media releases and social media 


You'll get a special invitation to visit the Spring Camp for a day in March 2015


We'll love you forever





Help financing all learning and sport supplies needed for all campers


All of the above+


Platinum Level Sponzorship acknowledgement for you or your company on our website's sponzors page including a link and a logo 


We will name the Spring Camp's cummunity hall after you


We'll love you forever and ever




FAQIf you have any questions, please contact us via email: info@studiumgenerale.hu
What are the results of our work that can confirm our
expertise and efficiency?
90% of those who participate in our camp
will gain admission to higher education. 80% of them can get into a certain
university or college, which they mark as first choice and more than 70% of
them will be able to study at the Corvinus University of Budapest. 
Where can I get more information about the
organization?
About the renowned and prestigious
organization of Studium Generale you can get more information on the following
website: www.studiumgenerale.hu.
Why is such a preparatory course needed to pass the
Matura exam? 
The preparatory course of Studium Generale
is needed, because there are huge differences between the high schools in
Hungary according to their financial background and the standards of education.
That is why students studying in poorer high schools that offer a lower
standard of education cannot acquire the knowledge or skills that are needed to
pass their Matura exam successfully to gain admission to higher education.  
Who are the young volunteers?
The whole organization involves 141
volunteers, who study at the Corvinus University of Budapest. They spend their
weekends and free time on teaching students without pay or compensation. They
are not qualified experts, but they have all achieved great results in the
field of mathematics, history and economics, so they all know what the target
group needs to do to pass the exams successfully. 
How can students participate in our camp? 
The students are ranked according to their
performance during the preparatory course, motivation and the results of their
mock exams taken during the year. From the 300-400 children 150 can participate
in the camp.

story:
What is the campaign about (in comics) 

Light of Hope - a Bangladesh-based non-profit started a crowd-supported project called 'The Reader' (in Bengali 'Porua') to establish small libraries in rural underprivileged primary schools. The brochure of the project best explained what the project is all about and also a reminder of our own childhood when we got the chance to read comics.  

As the comics is in Bengali, the translated versions are provided as text for your understanding.

পড়ুয়া (The Reader), an initiative by Light of Hope, aims to increase children’s creativity and power of imagination by giving access to story, science and other non-academic books at the underprivileged primary schools in Bangladesh.


We are collecting old story books by arranging campaigns at the college and universities in the cities. We are also collecting story books and children magazine from various development organizations. Through social media we are also collecting story books from individual.  


All the collected books come to our storage where we sort out the books according to age, fixing torn books and create a database of book donors so that we can keep a track where these books are going.  


We then select individual primary schools, discuss with them about the operation and maintenance of the library. We prioritize the rural primary schools where most of the children are from underprivileged family background. 

A teacher from the school or an adolescent from the community takes the charge of the library who issues the books to the children and maintain the library management. 

The children get the opportunity to read story books that they never imagined they would get a chance. Some of them dream to become a writer, some of them want to become a scientist... these books now will shape their imagination.  

Picture: 'Porua' (The Reader) brochure 


What We Did So Far? 

We are already running the campaign on Facebook and asking people to donate their old story books. We ran a 2 day campaign at American International University Bangladesh (AIUB). We contacted various organizations and corporate to run book collection campaign among their staff. Till date we collected more than 5056 story books and children magazine.

Library established: 7

Book and magazines collected/donated: 5056

Number of students having access to story books: 462

 

You can join our Facebook event page here:

https://www.facebook.com/events/741646552598617/


Picture: Children Magazine received from BRAC. Besides we also collected story books from UNICEF Bangladesh, Room to Read etc. 


Picture: 'The Reader' campaign in Banglalink Head Office - a major telecom company in Bangladesh 

Picture: The members of Light of Hope is sorting the story books according to age. 

Great news is we already established three libraries in three rural primary schools. The children of these schools (a little over 300) are having access to the story books for the first time of their life and they are amazingly happy about it. 

Picture: 'Porua' library at Porosmoni School in Kisorganj district, Bangladesh

Picture: Children are issuing story books from the library

Just look at the happy faces.... most of them have seen a story book for the first time in their life. The adolescent girl - Nirjana is the librarian of this library. She is studying in Standard 10 at the village and volunteering as the local Guardian for the library.   

Our Target

Our initial target is to collect 100,000 books and build 500 libraries all over the country within next 5 years. 

  • Collection of 100,000 story books and children magazine
  • Establish 500 libraries at 500 rural primary schools
  • About 50,000 students will have access to story books every year 

How your money will be spent?

The budget will be used to run the book collection campaigns at the colleges and universities, buying library shelves, human resource cost, book transportation, communication materials like brochure, sticker etc. We will not use the money to buy story books as they will be mostly collected or will be funded through our internal social media campaigning. 

With this amount we will be able to establish 300 small libraries in rural primary schools of Bangladesh. 

How we will reach our target? 

We already prepared a list of 100 universities and colleges at Dhaka - the capital of Bangladesh and dedicated our representatives and volunteers to run the book collection campaigns. In our group, we have faculty and students as our members to run these campaigns. 

We are contacting the corporate, book publishers and development organizations to donate the story books. Interested schools are contacting us for the library and we are keeping their database. After careful verification we will build libraries at those schools. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can't contribute with donation. But while you can't donate, but some of your friends may can. So, please don't hold yourself. If you like our work then share the link with your friends via your social media. 

Remember, sharing is caring.

story:
My objective is to bring fun back too our youth and families with electronic entertainment Invention

 Bronx, New York, United States  Gaming

Blessings, my name is Kashani Aytch, 41 of Age, Bronx Resident of New York City, My passion is to  become a (future Inventor). I was formerly a business partner, in a website called All My Hood Dot Com, I'm presently a Program Developer for The Gospel Party, an Interactive online website on www.harlemlanesradio.com, Every Sunday 7-9pm. I have five years experience, in Leadership Skills.

My purpose, and importance of this campaign is to raise $7,000, which is to (PROTECT) my creative idea & concept for my Invention. Especially when creating an professional sketched prototype. Also, it protects me from Marketing and Licensing Companies, Manufacturers, and Investors.

What I Need

The Contirbutors Achievement and Funding Finance Purpose:

  1. Patent Search $299.
  2. Professional Patent Drawing $399
  3. Trade Mark World Wide $499
  4. Copy Rights $204
  5. Provisional Patent $329, P.P. is only protected for one year.
  6. Marketing & Licensing  Company $200
  7. Utility Patent
  • Step 1  Preliminary Assestment Drawing $699
  • Step 2 Application $2,400
  1. LLC- Limited Liabilty Company  $499
  2. Advertising $1,472 

Total Basic Start Cost $7,000

The Impact

Your Contributions is going to (Flexible Funding Campaign) made through PayPal account instantly. I receive disbursement confirmation from Paypal with each, Contribution. After contribution been sent , My PayPal account will be (charged a 9% Platform fee by Indiegogo). If I meet my Goal of $7,000, Indiegogo  9% platform fee become (reduce) to a 4% platform fee. Example (9%-5%=4%) ONLY, if I meet my goal.  

Indiegogo refund, of  the 5% of the money will be sent directly to PayPal account  within 10 business day after my Campaign (deadline).

 So, this is why your impact so (Critically Important, as a Contributor).

I'm using (reputable) company (Legal Zoom) that I have used before, and was satisfy with their services.

Your's contribution will start a (safe protection) of my Invention which I will be able to achieve with your contributions.

I need your contributions  family, friends, and supporters.

Team Members

This is my first invention project but I have (systems) of a great Team. 

  1.  Willie Aytch- Production Engineer Time Warner / Digital Media/ Video & Audio/DJ/ Editor/ Bronx Community College
  2. Kenneth L. Aytch  Jr. -Web Developer/ Photographer/ Management/ Entrepreneur/BA Mount Saint Mary College 
  3. Pamela J. Bodley- Leadership & Strategic Management/ Team Building/ MS Manhattanville College/ and Business MaryMount College
  4. Vivia van Dale- Legal Assistant/ Humanitarian
  5. Jay Farley- Music Producer/Owner of Recording Studio
  6. Jacqui Graham-Professional Photographer, Graham Image/Entrepreneur/ Consultant/Language Interpreter/ Business Management-Monroe College 
  7. Lashanda A. Hall- Payroll Adminstrator/ MBA/HRM-Business Admin/HR University of Phoenix/ and BA North Carolina Wesleyan  College 
  8. Melody Harris-  NYCDO Educational Assistant/Arts/Entrepreneur/Bronx Community College 
  9. Kiesha Pittman- Prudential Investments/ JP Morgan Chase Manhattan Bank/Marketing- Long Island University
  10. Delon A. Radebaugh- Human Resources/ Entrepreneur/ Business Technical Management-Devry University/ Bachelor of Science-Practical Writing-Criminal Justice/Criminology-Metropolitan State College
  11. Delmarva Smith- Certified Travel Agent/ Business Administration- North Carolina Central University 
  12. Barbara Street- Marketing & Public Relations / Associates- Business & Marketing Lenoir Community College 
  13. Eddie Wilkes- Sketch Artist

My team members experience, expertise, and leadership skills is what qualifies me to gain your trust, I say please become a contributor to my Funding Campaign.

Risks & Challenges 

I limited my (risk and challenges) because I built  (systems) around my Invention, which is my team members.  Those are hurdles and struggles that people face to be successful as business owners. It also cut the cost of my funding down dramatically through their start up (free) services, and being part of my team.

How I will deal with Risk and Challenges, I would look at my business, competition, and reevaluate what works, and doesn't, calculate my charts, financial statements, balance sheets evaluate quarterly adjustment growth , fix the weaknesses that needs to be made, and capitalize on my strength, with meetings of my (professional systems), which is my business team members. Then, make my final adjustments, of hurdles, and risk factors and challenges that we would face.

Other Ways You Can Help

Other ways you could show your support for me, (Kashani Aytch), future inventor is just get the word out. Through social media, word of mouth, and make a buzz about my Funding Campaign on Indiegogo. 

  • Reminder please use Indiegogo Share Tools, God Bless.
  • My contributors so far

1) Giavanni F.  2) Thelma A.  3) Willie A.  4) Kenneth A.  5) James H.  6) Samantha H.

7) Rodney B.  8) Delon Aitch R.  9) Jerry N.  10) Wanetta C. 11) Keisiva W.  

12) Jacqui G.  13) David Fowler H.  14) Yolanda T S.  15) Rich L.  16) Lewis W.

17) Kurt S.  18)  Cha Cha T.  19) Andrea G.  20) Rahsahn T.  21) Lamont T. 

22) Lisa Eddie-R.  23) Scottie W.  24) Ron W. 25) Roland S.  26) Elder Marsha B.

27) Precious H.  28) Aron M.  29) Jewel S.  30) Vivia Van D.  31) Craig H. 

32) Andrea Aitch O.  33) ShaSha S.  34) Lamont J.  

35) Lisa C.  36) Marsha F.   37) Natasha F.   38) Earl J. W.  39) Delecia M. 

40) Mickey A.  41)  Lady Lazelle  42) Richard B.  43) Kareemah Al-Amin

story:
Click hier für die Deutsche Version!

Water is Life!

Our earth is a waterplanet, a blue jewel in the universe. Life on land is only possible when our oceans and waters are healthy, clean and in balance. Around 70% of the world's oxygen we breath comes from the ocean. Around 70 % of our human body is water. Water covers 71% of the earth's surface. After the findings of water researcher Dr. Masaru Emoto, water is an information carrier of our thoughts, feelings, emotions and actions and this fact makes water to a colossal Databank of the world. The prime importance is, that we are able to change the structure and information of water in every moment with the information we prefer, for example LOVE AND GRATITUDE!

Our team of passionate water advocates from the private organisation "Waterangel" like to spread awareness about water qualities around the world!

In Japan we like to learn more about Dr. Emotos tremendous knowledge and the new science of water in his  Hado instructor school and share this with the world.

This journey is a great start for even bigger projects about Water!

  • Journey to Japan (Tokyo, Fuji, Fukushima, Taiji) in May 2015.
  • Special training to become a Hado instructor in an institut after the findings and knowledge of water researcher Dr. Masaru Emoto in May 2015.
  • The Hado Instructor training allows us to give lectures and profound backround to people all over the world about the water knowledge from Dr. Masaru Emoto at any time.
  • We interview people in different places of Japan to several water and ocean subjects and bring this informations together in a book or/and a film after this journey.
  • We do ceremonies and give prayers and blessings to the waters of Japan, especially to the Cove of Taiji (known from the Movie "The Cove") and Fukushima.
  • Journey on a boat to free dolphins and whales in the Ocean.

What we are doing with the funds and what you will receive in return:

For every support we created wonderful perks for you!

  • Funds raised will pay the flight to Japan for our team, the expenses for overnight accomodation, the Hado Instructor course at the school of Dr. Masaru Emoto and several technic equipment for interviews, photos and film and a balance suspension of earnings from our daily job.

  • In case we don't reach our funding goal, we will spend the funds for other water projects of our initiative "Waterangel". We work together with other international organisations for our oceanlife and like to support them.

  • We created wonderful perks for your support: You can receive special energy trivets for your drinking water, you can receive a personal photocard from the most beautiful waterplaces in Japan, we offer you a personal oracle card reading via skype (with PDF Data of your personal message) with water crystal cards or dolphincards or you can get a personal power meditation with us via skype. We would love to meet you here!
    • You can follow, support or join the process of all our projects now and in the future over our website:  www.wasserengel.net

    Importance and impact:

    We like to spread awareness of the importance, quality and beauty of water. Water is a life force for all of us! Life is only possible with water!

    In these days more and more companies want to get the rights about water resources in their private hands to control society.

    We believe in freedom of society and we believe that more than enough clean water is a birthright of all beings and free for humankind!

    We support this belief in different educational projects, campaigns, events, waterceremonies and actions in our daily life.

    Also we show people how they can energize and clean water in their daily life with simple things and methods. We tell people the true power of water, well - meant in a natural way for the wealth of all. We give (coaching) seminars, lectures and workshop about the true nature of water and consciousness itself.  We teach children at school and kindergarten  about the essence of water.

    We like to create a film and write a book about the true nature of water, so all people get the chance to receive the knowledge of Dr.Masaru Emotos findings and the new science of water. We like to create a better world for our children and future generations. We like to heal mother earth and oceanlife with our daily work and this campaign.

    Water is an information carrier for our thoughts, emotions and words and all other vibrations. This knowledge includes a great healing potential and the chance of peace in the world. When we all are aware of the reality, that we can influence the quality of water with our own vibrational energy of thoughts, words and actions, than clean and clear water is managable for everybody and we ourself are the source for healthy water.

    After the death of Dr. Masaru Emoto in october 2014 we want to support his  lifework and the "Message of Water."

    When water is the universal mirror of everything, how do you like to think, talk and take action in your life?

    We like to be successful with our campaign till the first days of April 2015, because we need enough time to book the flights and overnight accomodations and buy the technic equipment for audio and film recordings. We can get the training of the Hado instructions at school of Masaru Emoto only in special days in May and need to book the training till the middle of april 2015 . So there is a special timeline for us to organize everything before the journey.

    For a successful campaign we will inform as many people as we can, connect to other water advocates, defenders and lovers and create special water events in our local area.

    Our Love and Gratitude for Water is deep and endless like the Ocean!

    Other ways to help or support our Campaign:

    When you like to support our campaign through other ways than money we like to invite you to tell other people from our campaign and spread the word about the importance of clean and healthy water. Thank you!

    You can use a special tool from Indiegogo to send this campaign to more people.

    See the symbols on the left side of this page.

    Thank you very much with Love and Gratitude! 

    Waterangel by facebook

    Waterangel by youtube

    Waterangel

    ..........................................................................................................................................

    Deutsche Version

    ..........................................................................................................................................

    Wasser ist Leben!

    Unsere Erde ist ein Wasserplanet, ein blaues Juwel im Universum. Leben an Land ist nur möglich, wenn unsere Ozeane und unser Wasser sauber, gesund und in Balance sind. Ungefähr 70% von dem Sauerstoff unserer Atemluft wird von den Ozeanen produziert. Circa 70% unseres menschlichen Körpers ist aus Wasser. Die Oberfläche unseres Planeten Erde besteht zu 71% aus Wasser. Nach den Untersuchungen des Wasserforschers Dr. Masaru Emoto ist Wasser ein Informationsträger unserer Gedanken, Gefühle, Emotionen und Handlungen und somit vergleichbar mit einer überdimensional grossen Datenbank. Wesentlich ist, dass wir das Wasser in jedem Moment neu informieren können und somit die alten Daten überschreiben, neu gestalten und verändern können zum Beispiel mit LIEBE UND DANKBARKEIT !
    Unser Team aus liebevollen und engagierten WasserfürsprecherInnen der privaten Organisation „Wasserengel“, möchte Menschen in der ganzen Welt aufklären über die Botschaft des Wassers. Ausserdem möchten wir beitragen  einem allgemeinen Bewusstsein neue Türen zu eröffnen, um die Qualität von Wasser zum Wohle aller zu verbessern.

    In Japan möchten wir die Hado Instructor Schule des berühmten Wasserforschers Dr. Masaru Emoto besuchen, um dort eine Ausbildung zu absolvieren. Somit dürfen wir noch mehr lernen über das enorme Wissen von Dr. Masaru Emoto und erhalten die offizielle Erlaubnis Vorträge in der ganzen Welt zu halten, um das Wissen an andere Menschen weiter zu geben und mit ihnen zu teilen.

    Diese Reise ist ebenfalls ein Auftakt für zahlreiche weitere Projekte zum Thema Wasser, die wir realisieren möchten!

    •  Reise nach Japan (Tokio, Fuji, Fukushima, Taiji) im Mai 2015.
    • Spezielle Ausbildung zum Hado Instructor im May 2015 in der Schule des Wasserforschers Dr. Masaru Emoto.
    •  Durch die Ausbildung erhalten wir die offizielle Erlaubnis, dass Wissen und die Erkenntnisse von Dr. Masaru Emoto in Vorträgen weltweit zu lehren.
    • Interviews mit Menschen in Japan über verschieden Themen zum Wasser und anschliessende Bearbeitung zu einem Film und einem Buch.
    • Wir halten heilende Wasserzeremonien an verschiedenen Orten in Japan, z.B. in Fukushima und in Taiji (bekannt aus dem Film „Die Bucht“).
    • Reise auf einem Boot zu freilebenden Delphinen und Walen im Ozean.

    Was  wir mit den Geldern machen und was wir zurück geben:

    Für jede Unterstützung haben wir wundervolle Ausgleichsgeschenke gestaltet!

    • Die Gelder werden verwendet für Flug nach Japan, Kosten für Übernachtungen und Ausbildung zum Hado Instructor für unser Team an der Schule von Dr. Masaru Emoto, Anteiliger Ausgleich des Verdienstausfall während der Reise, Technisches Equipment für Interview-, Photo- und Filmaufnahmen.
    • Wenn das Ziel der Kampagne nicht erreicht werden sollte, werden wir die gesammelten Gelder für andere Projekte zum Wohle des Wassers verwenden, die unsere Initiative „Wasserengel“ begleitet und gestaltet. Beispielsweise unterstützt Wasserengel verschiedene internationale Organisationen, die sich für das Leben in den Ozeanen engagieren.
    • Wir haben wundervolle Ausgleichsgeschenke für Deine Unterstützung bereitgestellt: Du erhälst entweder eine Ausahl von verschiedenen Getränkeuntersetzern, um Dein Getränke zu energetisieren, eine persönliche Postkarte von unserem Team mit den wunderschönsten Orten am Wasser in Japan, ein persönliches Orakel Karten Reading mit Wasser - und Delphinkarten via Skype (mit entsprecheneder PDF Datei zu Deiner persönlichen Botschaft) oder eine persönliche Session in Power Meditation mit unserem Team via Skype. Wir freuen uns sehr, Dich hier begrüssen zu dürfen!
    • Du kannst den Prozess unserer Kampagne und verschiedener Projekte jederzeit nachschauen und unterstützen über unsere website: www.wasserengel.net

    Wichtigkeit und Auswirkungen unserer Kampagne:

    Unser Ziel ist es, Bewusstheit im Umgang mit Wasser zu schaffen und die wahre Essenz, Kraft und Schönheit des Wassers für alle Menschen zugänglich zu machen. Wasser ist Lebenskraft für uns alle! Leben ist nur mit Wasser möglich! In der aktuellen Zeit möchten mehr und mehr Firmen die Rechte über Wasservorräte der Erde privatisieren, um somit die Gesellschaft und Menschen kontrollieren zu können. Wir sind der Überzeugung, dass sauberes Wasser ein Geburtsrecht von uns allen ist und möchten durch Bildung, Aufklärung Kampagnen und Wasserzeremonien dem aktuellen Bestreben verschiedener Firmen und Politiker Einhalt gebieten.

    Wir engagieren uns für mehr als genug sauberes, energetisches Wasser für alle Wesen dieses Planeten!

    Auch zeigen wir den Menschen, wie sie ihr Trinkwasser auf einfachste und preisgünstigste Weise reinigen und energetisieren können. Wir erklären Menschen, die wahre Natur und Essenz des Wassers in wohlgemeinter natürlicher Weise zum Wohle aller Wesen. Wir geben Workshops, Vorträge und Seminare in Kindergärten, Schulen und Bildungsveranstaltungen.

    Wir möchten einen Film drehen und ein Buch schreiben über die wahre Natur des Wassers, dem Wissen von Dr. Masaru Emoto und den Erlebnissen und Interviews unserer Reise. Wir möchten unseren Anteil daran leisten, eine liebevolle, friedvolle und saubere Welt für uns, unsere Kinder und zukünftige Generationen zu erschaffen. Wir möchte Mutter Erde heilen und ebenso unsere Ozeane mit unseren täglichen Aktivitäten, dieser Kampagne und unserem Sein.

    Wasser ist ein Informationsträger für unsere Gedanken, Emotionen, Worte und Handlungen und allen anderen Vibrationen. Dieses Wissen und Verstehen enthält eine grosse Chance um Frieden in der Welt zu erschaffen und ein grosses Heilungspotential für uns alle.

    Wenn wir alle uns bewusst darüber sind, dass wir selbst die Qualität des Wassers durch unsere Gedanken , Gefühle, Worte und Handlungen beeinflussen können, dann ist sauberes und energetisiertes Wasser für jeden von uns reichlich vorhanden und wir selbst sind die Quelle sauberen, gesunden Wassers!

    Nach dem Tod von Dr. Masaru Emoto im Oktober 2014 möchten wir in seinem Namen die „Botschaft des Wassers“ weiterhin in der Welt verbreiten und mitteilen.

    Wenn Wasser der universelle Spiegel von allem ist, was möchtest Du dann denken, fühlen, sprechen? Wie möchtest Du handeln Dir selbst, anderen und allem gegenüber?

    Wir möchten erfolgreich sein mit unserer Kampagne und das Kampagneziel erreichen bis zum 12. April 2015, da wir uns bis mitte April bei der Hado Instructor Schule anmelden müssen, um an der Ausbildung teilnehmen zu können. Zudem ist es wesentlich vorher die Flüge und Unterkünfte zu buchen und das technische Equipment für die Reise einzukaufen.

    Wir wünschen vor der Reise einige Tage Zeit, um alles entsprechend organisieren und planen zu können.

    Vielen Dank!

    Für eine erfolgreiche Kampagne werden wir so viele Leute wie möglich informieren und motivieren für unsere Ziele. Wir verbinden uns mit anderen Wasserfreunden und Wasserfürsprecher und veranstalten spezielle Events und Einladungen über Wasser in unserer unmittelbaren Umgebung.

    Unsere Liebe und Dankbarkeit für Wasser ist tief und endlos wie der Ozean!!!

    Andere Wege wie Du unsere Kampagne unterstützen kannst:

    Wenn Du unsere Kampagne unterstützen möchtest durch andere Wege als mit Geld, möchten wir Dich einladen uns zu kontaktieren für weitere Ideen. Bitte erzähle anderen Leuten und Freunden von unserer Kampagne und motiviere sie, uns zu unterstützen für sauberes Wasser in unseren Körpern und auf unserer Erde.

    Vielen herzlichen Dank!

    Du kannst eine spezielle Einstellung von Indigogo verwenden, um diese Kampagne an möglichst viele Leute auf einfache und schnelle Weise weiter zu schicken. Verwende die Symbole links auf dieser Seite.

    Vielen Dank für Deine Unterstützung!

    Wir verbleiben in Liebe und Dankbarkeit! 

    Wasserenegel bei facebook

    Wasserengel bei youtube

    Wasserengel
story_txt:
Click hier für die Deutsche Version!

 Water is Life!


Our earth is a waterplanet, a blue jewel in the universe. Life on land is only possible when our oceans and waters are healthy, clean and in balance. Around 70% of the world's oxygen we breath comes from the ocean. Around 70 % of our human body is water. Water covers 71% of the earth's surface. After the findings of water researcher Dr. Masaru Emoto, water is an information carrier of our thoughts, feelings, emotions and actions and this fact makes water to a colossal Databank of the world. The prime importance is, that we are able to change the structure and information of water in every moment with the information we prefer, for example LOVE AND GRATITUDE!
 Our team of passionate water advocates from the private organisation "Waterangel" like to spread awareness about water qualities around the world!
 In Japan we like to learn more about Dr. Emotos tremendous knowledge and the new science of water in his  Hado instructor school and share this with the world.
 This journey is a great start for even bigger projects about Water! 


Journey to Japan (Tokyo, Fuji, Fukushima, Taiji) in May 2015.


Special training to become a Hado instructor in an institut after the findings and knowledge of water researcher Dr. Masaru Emoto in May 2015.

The Hado Instructor training allows us to give lectures and profound backround to people all over the world about the water knowledge from Dr. Masaru Emoto at any time.


We interview people in different places of Japan to several water and ocean subjects and bring this informations together in a book or/and a film after this journey.


We do ceremonies and give prayers and blessings to the waters of Japan, especially to the Cove of Taiji (known from the Movie "The Cove") and Fukushima.

Journey on a boat to free dolphins and whales in the Ocean.
 
 
What we are doing with the funds and what you will receive in return:
For every support we created wonderful perks for you!


Funds raised will pay the flight to Japan for our team, the expenses for
 overnight accomodation, the Hado Instructor course at the school of Dr.
 Masaru Emoto and several technic equipment for interviews, photos and 
film and a balance suspension of earnings from our daily job.


In case we don't reach our funding goal, we will spend the funds for other water projects of our initiative "Waterangel". We work together with other international organisations for our oceanlife and like to support them.



We created wonderful perks for your support: You can receive special energy trivets for your drinking water, you can receive a personal photocard from the most beautiful waterplaces in Japan, we offer you a personal oracle card reading via skype (with PDF Data of your personal message) with water crystal cards or dolphincards or you can get a personal power meditation with us via skype. We would love to meet you here!

You can follow, support or join the process of all our projects now and in the future over our website:  www.wasserengel.netImportance and impact:
 We like to spread awareness of the importance, quality and beauty of water. Water is a life force for all of us! Life is only possible with water!
 In these days more and more companies want to get the rights about water resources in their private hands to control society.
 We believe in freedom of society and we believe that more than enough clean water is a birthright of all beings and free for humankind!
We support this belief in different educational projects, campaigns, events, waterceremonies and actions in our daily life.
Also we show people how they can energize and clean water in their daily life with simple things and methods. We tell people the true power of water, well - meant in a natural way for the wealth of all. We give (coaching) seminars, lectures and workshop about the true nature of water and consciousness itself.  We teach children at school and kindergarten  about the essence of water.
 We like to create a film and write a book about the true nature of water, so all people get the chance to receive the knowledge of Dr.Masaru Emotos findings and the new science of water. We like to create a better world for our children and future generations. We like to heal mother earth and oceanlife with our daily work and this campaign.

Water is an information carrier for our thoughts, emotions and words 
and all other vibrations. This knowledge includes a great healing 
potential and the chance of peace in the world. When we all are aware of the reality, that we 
can influence the quality of water with our own vibrational energy of thoughts, 
words and actions, than clean and clear water is managable for everybody
 and we ourself are the source for healthy water.

After the death of Dr. Masaru Emoto in october 2014 we want to support his  lifework and the "Message of Water."
When water is the universal mirror of everything, how do you like to think, talk and take action in your life?We like to be successful with our campaign till the first days of April 2015, because we need enough time to book the flights and overnight accomodations and buy the technic equipment for audio and film recordings. We can get the training of the Hado instructions at school of Masaru Emoto only in special days in May and need to book the training till the middle of april 2015 . So there is a special timeline for us to organize everything before the journey.


For a successful campaign we will inform as many people as we can, connect to other water advocates, defenders and lovers and create special water events in our local area.
Our Love and Gratitude for Water is deep and endless like the Ocean!
  Other ways to help or support our Campaign: When you like to support our campaign through other ways than money we like to invite you to tell other people from our campaign and spread the word about the importance of clean and healthy water. Thank you!
You can use a special tool from Indiegogo to send this campaign to more people.
See the symbols on the left side of this page.


Thank you very much with Love and Gratitude! 
Waterangel by facebook
Waterangel by youtube

Waterangel

story:
IMPORTANT UPDATE!!!:

Due to some developments beyond my control and others well within it, I've decided to change my crowdfunding strategy. I put in a lot of work to prepare for the campaign and when I pressed "go" I thought all was going to roll forward as planned, but I very quickly realized that my timing was wrong. I was planning to time the crowdfunding to coincide with the publicity campaign for the release of my Africa double CD set, which was supposed to happen in mid-May. There were some production delays -- my fault -- and the CD just went to the duplicator last week. That means a release in late June, which means I missed the boat on combining the funding with the p.r. push...d'oh.

In trying to figure out what to do I think I came up with a better idea than just try to extend this campaign.

Here is the new page:
http://www.allaroundthisworld.com/1000ClassroomCampaign

Rather than just generally ask for donations, I'm going to focus on collecting a whole lot of pledges/donations of $25 each  -- 1000 of them, to be exact. Each $25 pledge will translate directly into a year-long scholarship to Explore Everywhere for a classroom in a school. (kind of like the $40 perk level on this page, but for a whole year instead of 3 months.) Only when I reach the critical mass number of 1000 supporters will I collect the money. I'll then make a big stink of it and take very actively to social and traditional media to offer the 1000 scholarships to schools worldwide.

So go to that page and pledge $25 to help me give global music to 25,000 kids.

I've reached out to everyone who already put support toward this campaign to let them know their perk levels are still 100% valid and, in fact, I'm bumping everyone up so all current supporters get more than I've listed.

And thanks to IndieGoGo--great platform, really good service. The switch is all me, not you.

The best laid plans...,
Jay

Help make the world much smaller by supporting the launch of "Explore Everywhere," an ambitious global music and world cultures educational program for kids and their families. "Explore Everywhere" will give kids ANYWHERE, from all economic backgrounds, unlimited online access to inspiring global music and engaging multicultural lessons that will help them open their minds, and their lives, to "the great out there."

All Around This World is a global music and world cultures program that introduces young children and their families to the world through interactive international music and movement. I'm Jay Sand, the program's founder and lead teacher, and I want to share these magical music classes with all kids regardless of their geographic location, their cultural background or ability to pay. Help me make great world music and cultural exploration available to everyone by launching AN ENGAGING ONLINE VERSION of All Around This World called, "EXPLORE EVERYWHERE." 

“Explore Everywhere” is All Around This World’s new multimedia program, accessible for streaming anytime on any laptop, tablet, smart phone or other device, that will provide musical, multicultural material meant to inspire REAL LIFE global learning experiences for explorers of all ages -- especially but not exclusively for young children, their families and their schools. 

SUBSCRIBERS WILL START EACH WEEK BY “COMING TO CLASS.” Explore Everywhere subscribers will join me every week for a participatory global music and world cultures class that will introduce them and their kids to an abundance of different countries and cultures. Video of a new class will be available for streaming every week for grownups to experience together with their kids who are old enough for screen time. Beyond class, subscribers will receive EXCLUSIVE DAILY CONTENT that will inspire and engage their natural curiosity about different countries and cultures.

For each “season” of Explore Everywhere classes, every individual, family, or classroom that subscribes will receive unlimited streaming of one of All Around This World’s AWARD-WINNING CDS to use as an audio “textbook” for the class. Most All Around This World seasons focus on music and culture form a geographic region of the world — AFRICA, EASTERN EUROPE, SOUTH AND CENTRAL ASIA, etc. . . . Each CD features approximately two dozen songs that originate from different parts of the region. LEARN ABOUT ALL AROUND THIS WORLD's 12 FULL SEASONS OF CLASSES.

Subscribers will receive NEW GLOBAL MUSIC AND WORLD CULTURES CONTENT TO SHARE WITH THEIR KIDS EVERY DAY. That means  songs, dances, instrument-building projects, cultural celebrations, family-friendly book and movie recommendations, "sing-alongs," cooking demonstrations and much more. Schools that subscribe will receive TEACHER-TRAINING VIDEOS so teachers can know how to bring the learning into their classrooms.  WHAT DO SUBSCRIBERS GET? OH SO MUCH.



I'm initiating this IndieGoGo campaign not to inspire a one-time influx of funds -- though I have nothing against influxing, so if want to flux, flux! -- but with the hope of inspiring an initial base of families and schools to subscribe to Explore Everywhere. 

My goal is to raise $20,000 by May 15by signing up at least 1000 subscribers. 

1000 SUBSCRIBERS could equal 1000 CLASSROOMS.

At most of the Perk levels, when a family subscribes to Explore Everywhere, at least on classroom at a school or a family that needs a scholarship will receive a free subscription. The more support you give, the more kids will gain access to great global learning.

GETTING A SUBSCRIPTION = GIVING A SUBSCRIPTION TO A CLASSROOM OR FAMILY IN NEED.

Something to note about Explore Everywhere: IT'S NOT JUST FOR KIDS. All the information will be appropriate for families, and some items, like the weekly classes, will be best if enjoyed alongside younguns, but I only distribute content that I find inherently worth sharing. If you have any interest at all in "the great out there" I'm sure you'll find some Explore Everywhere content worthwhile. If your kids are older than my usual students or if you don't have kids at all, you'll still be happy if you come along. Though, kids singing All Around This World songs do have fun:

After spending many of my post-college years backpacking around the world with my guitar, I landed happily in Philadelphia with an expanding family that ultimately grew to consist of three unstoppable little girls. When my first daughter was born I took her to a children's music class and enjoyed the experience so much that I found a way to start teaching the classes. I eventually branched out on my own and started All Around This World in 2009 with the mission of introducing my children, and the children in his neighborhood, to the joy and wonder of "the great out there." 

I've since taught over a thousand parent-child classes in my West Philadelphia living room, developing a uniquely satisfying approach to teaching cultural awareness to kids. I'm launching "Explore Everywhere" to give kids everywhere a chance to experience the interactive international fun that's currently only available to a few kids who live in the few places All Around This World classes are currently offered.

WHEN YOUR PERK SUBSCRIPTION RUNS OUT

Don't worry -- once your perk subscription time period runs out IndieGoGo won't bill you  automatically for anything else. Before your time ends I will contact you asking you if you want to continue your subscription. I hope so! If so we'll work out payment details from that point forward.  A subscription to Explore Everywhere will cost $6.99/month for an individual, $9.99/month for a family and $19.99/month for a classroom. (Classrooms will get access to special things like teacher training videos.)

INTERESTED IN A SCHOLARSHIP?

Contact me through the All Around This World website. Let me know if you're an individual, a family or a school. I'll ask you a few questions and we'll start there.

SPEAKING OF SCHOLARSHIPS

The more subscribers who support this campaign the more schools and families will be able to learn about the world with me and Explore Everywhere. If you're a school interested in receiving a scholarships, spread the word in your community. If one of your supporters picks a perk that includes scholarships for classroom that supporter can choose to reserve the scholarship for your school.

If more subscribers sign up through the campaign than there are families or schools that have applied for scholarships, I'll make sure the number of scholarships available matches the perk amounts over time. For example, if your perk gives 25 families free subscriptions but by the end of the campaign there are only 20 families left on the scholarship list, the next 5 families that apply will start their three month scholarship subscription at the beginning of the next month. Questions? Very happy to answer them.

MORE ABOUT EXPLORE EVERYWHERE:

Explore Everywhere FAQ

MORE ABOUT ALL AROUND THIS WORLD:

http://www.allaroundthisworld.com

SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN:

Share using the IndieGoGo sharing tools found on this page | Follow All Around This World on Twitter @AATWMusic and retweet boldly when the campaign is mentioned | Follow AATW on Facebook and share campaign-related posts

Questions? Contact me through the All Around This World website.


Be well, my friends. And thank you.
story_txt:
IMPORTANT UPDATE!!!:Due to some developments beyond my control and others well within it, I've decided to change my crowdfunding strategy. I put in a lot of work to prepare for the campaign and when I pressed "go" I thought all was going to roll forward as planned, but I very quickly realized that my timing was wrong. I was planning
    to time the crowdfunding to coincide with the publicity campaign for
    the release of my Africa double CD set, which was supposed to
    happen in mid-May. There were some
    production delays -- my fault -- and the CD just went to the
    duplicator last week. That means a release in late June, which means
    I missed the boat on combining the funding with the p.r.
    push...d'oh.In trying to figure out what to do I think I came up with a better idea than just try to extend this campaign. Here is the new page:http://www.allaroundthisworld.com/1000ClassroomCampaignRather
    than just generally ask for donations, I'm
    going to focus on collecting a whole lot of
    pledges/donations of $25 each  -- 1000 of them, to be exact. Each $25
    pledge will translate directly into a year-long scholarship to
    Explore Everywhere for a classroom in a school. (kind of like the
    $40 perk level on this page, but for a whole year instead
    of 3 months.) Only when I reach the critical mass number of 1000
    supporters will I collect the money. I'll then make a big stink of it and take very
    actively to social and traditional media to offer the 1000 scholarships to schools worldwide. So go to that page and pledge $25 to help me give global music to 25,000 kids. I've reached out to everyone who already put support toward this campaign to let them know their perk levels are still 100% valid and, in fact, I'm bumping everyone up so all current supporters get more than I've listed. And thanks to IndieGoGo--great platform, really good service. The switch is all me, not you.The best laid plans...,Jay

Help make the world much smaller by supporting the launch of "Explore Everywhere," an ambitious global music and world cultures educational program for kids and their families. "Explore Everywhere" will give kids ANYWHERE, from all economic backgrounds, unlimited online access to inspiring global music and engaging multicultural lessons that will help them open their minds, and their lives, to "the great out there."






All Around This World is a global music and world cultures program that introduces young children and their families to the world through interactive international music and movement. I'm Jay Sand, the program's founder and lead teacher, and I want to share these magical music classes with all kids regardless of their geographic location, their cultural background or ability to pay. Help me make great world music and cultural exploration available to everyone by launching AN ENGAGING ONLINE VERSION of All Around This World called, "EXPLORE EVERYWHERE." 






“Explore Everywhere” is All Around This World’s new multimedia program, accessible for streaming anytime on any laptop, tablet, smart phone or other device, that will provide musical, multicultural material meant to inspire REAL LIFE global learning experiences for explorers of all ages -- especially but not exclusively for young children, their families and their schools.  
SUBSCRIBERS WILL START EACH WEEK BY “COMING TO CLASS.” Explore Everywhere subscribers will join me every week for a participatory global music and world cultures class that will introduce them and their kids to an abundance of different countries and cultures. Video of a new class will be available for streaming every week for grownups to experience together with their kids who are old enough for screen time. Beyond class, subscribers will receive EXCLUSIVE DAILY CONTENT that will inspire and engage their natural curiosity about different countries and cultures. 


For each “season” of Explore Everywhere classes,
 every individual, family, or classroom that subscribes will receive 
unlimited streaming of one of All Around This World’s AWARD-WINNING CDS to
 use as an audio “textbook” for the class. Most All Around This World 
seasons focus on music and culture form a geographic region of the world
 — AFRICA, EASTERN EUROPE, SOUTH AND CENTRAL ASIA, etc. . . . Each CD features 
approximately two dozen songs that originate from different parts of the
 region. LEARN ABOUT ALL AROUND THIS WORLD's 12 FULL SEASONS OF CLASSES.
Subscribers will receive NEW GLOBAL MUSIC AND WORLD CULTURES CONTENT TO SHARE WITH THEIR KIDS EVERY DAY.
 That means  songs, dances, instrument-building projects, cultural 
celebrations, family-friendly book and movie recommendations, 
"sing-alongs," cooking demonstrations and much more. Schools that 
subscribe will receive TEACHER-TRAINING VIDEOS so teachers can know how 
to bring the learning into their classrooms.  WHAT DO SUBSCRIBERS GET? OH SO MUCH.
I'm initiating this IndieGoGo campaign not to inspire a one-time influx of funds -- though I have nothing against influxing, so if want to flux, flux! -- but with the hope of inspiring an initial base of families and schools to subscribe to Explore Everywhere. 
My goal is to raise $20,000 by May 15by signing up at least 1000 subscribers. 
1000 SUBSCRIBERS could equal 1000 CLASSROOMS.
At most of the Perk levels, when a family subscribes to Explore Everywhere, at least on classroom at a school or a family that needs a scholarship will receive a free subscription. The more support you give, the more kids will gain access to great global learning.
GETTING A SUBSCRIPTION = GIVING A SUBSCRIPTION TO A CLASSROOM OR FAMILY IN NEED.



Something to note about Explore Everywhere: IT'S NOT JUST FOR KIDS. All the information will be appropriate for families, and some items, like the weekly classes, will be best if enjoyed alongside younguns, but I only distribute content that I find inherently worth sharing. If you have any interest at all in "the great out there" I'm sure you'll find some Explore Everywhere content worthwhile. If your kids are older than my usual students or if you don't have kids at all, you'll still be happy if you come along. Though, kids singing All Around This World songs do have fun:


After spending many of my post-college years backpacking around the world with my guitar, I landed happily in Philadelphia with an expanding family that ultimately grew to consist of three unstoppable little girls. When my first daughter was born I took her to a children's music class and enjoyed the experience so much that I found a way to start teaching the classes. I eventually branched out on my own and started All Around This World in 2009 with the mission of introducing my children, and the children in his neighborhood, to the joy and wonder of "the great out there."

once your perk subscription time period runs out IndieGoGo won't bill 
you  automatically for anything else. Before your time ends I 
will contact you asking you if you want to continue your subscription. I hope so! If so we'll work out payment details from that point forward.  A subscription to Explore Everywhere will cost $6.99/month for an individual, $9.99/month for a family and $19.99/month for a classroom. (Classrooms will get access to special things like teacher training videos.)
INTERESTED IN A SCHOLARSHIP?
 Contact me through the All Around This World website. Let me know if you're an individual, a family or a school. I'll ask you a few questions and we'll start there.

The
 more subscribers who support this campaign the more schools and

Explore Everywhere. If you're a school interested in receiving a scholarships, spread the word in your community.
 If one of your supporters picks a perk that includes scholarships for

Explore Everywhere FAQ

http://www.allaroundthisworld.com

story:
The Pursuit of Healing

Hello everyone!  My name is Zach; I am raising money to continue my pursuit of becoming a certified healer.  I have spent my life learning the healing arts and am ready to take on the certification process. For me the first step in this process would be to learn to teach yoga; to study ways to strengthen and balance, harmonizing these things together to help heal the body. I intend to continue beyond this in time and learn Massage therapy as well, including Reiki and other healing modalities.

I have been fortunate that my family and friends have been so supportive of my pursuit of the healing arts, and I have studied yoga since I was young.  I have dedicated myself to not only the improvement of my own practice, but also helping grow the practices of others. I am at a place in my life where I am ready to dedicate myself further, and become an active healing being in my community.

Living in the fast-paced, fiercely competitive world of today, it isn’t always easy to follow the path your heart is taking you.  Without proper certification, it is almost impossible to get a foothold in a yoga practice career. My intentions are set to achieve my 200 hour yoga teacher training certification, and while I have the will to make it happen, the events of life make it difficult to afford. Becoming certified is a critical step in any healer’s or healing teacher’s path, and is something I know I am ready for.

My goal is to raise $2200to help fulfill my dream, and continue on my heartfelt path of yogic practice and the spread of the healing arts.

That’s why you are so important – every donation goes toward my pursuit of healing, and so every donation becomes a healing force in this world.

Even just to have the reach to have you read these words, I am grateful.

It is not about the amount! It is about community, which is what is truly vital to me.

This being said, as tokens of gratitude to my contributors, I have a few rewards to be aware of:

-25-

A signed original art print – some of my healing-inspired expression

-50-

A human nutrition consultation service + the art print!

-100-

A human design chart reading – much like an astrology reading but with greater depth, + the art print!

-500-

An original painting – inspired from my practice of yoga + the human design chart reading!

story:
fulfills the dreams of people with talent in their hands...

...artists, designers and craftsmen who, due to phisical disabilities, economic problems or other difficulties, cannot make their ideas come true. 

Hand Artis Fabrica, is a no-profit association, and doesn't relyes on taxpayers money in any way. Till now Hand has lived only thanks to the donations and the work of the founders, supporters and friends. 

Each year, Hand Artis Fabrica gives to these people a free workshop to produce a collection of furniture, house accessories and art works: tables, chairs, sofas, dishes, glasses, beds, lamps, other house accessories and art items, all of wich are put together in a collection. Thanks to this workshop, wich started in september 2014, furniture, house accessories and objects are being made for the first collection called “Intuition”. The Intuition collection is produced by the high security prisoners in the Saluzzo jail (close to Turin),


  young designers,


and artists with phisical disabilities (like Rokhaya Kamara from Senegal, who is paraplegic). 


The “Intuition” Collection will be presented at the “Fuorisalone” event, during the Salone Internazionale del Mobile (International Interior Design Exhibition) week in Milan (14-19 April 2015),  at "Spazio v25" (via Voghera, 25, Milan) in the Tortona District Design.

COME TO SEE THE UNVEILING OF THE COLLECTION!!!

The items will be sold and the handamade multiples of these furniture, house accessories and objects, will be available for  sale on the art-design market, these will enable Hand to give each year a free workshop to create collections made by artists with talent in their hands, and in difficult situations.


All the participants who are creating the objects have been and are still being supported during the workshop by an artistic direction which gives the guidelines of the collection and cooperate together in adhesion to the values of the Hand Artis Fabrica. The values are the bases of Hand: people are the greatest value, each person is a universe full of potential. Hand believes in people and in the timeless human values: freedom, dignity and responsibility.


Due to this reason, Hand artists are helped in developing their own personality (learning to control emotional problems) and their creativity with Caycedian Sophrology: a scientific discipline which helps people to become self-conscious of their own value. I am Viviana Loche, co-founder and director of Hand and I’m also a Caycedian Sophrologist Master Specialist, head of the Caycedian Sophrology Schools of Milan and Rome.

I believe that the best way to help people is to help them in making their dreams come true: for example if they are able to do a job they like, they feel satisfied in life. There’s a saying which says:”if you want to make a person happy, don’t give him a fish: teach him to fish”. Hand makes both things: gives the fishe at the start and after teachs to fish in wonderful seas and rivers.

Each year we look for talented artists and designers looking for help, from countries all over  the world and our idea is to, starting from Milan, grow in other countries all connected together, to create objects and art that have a timeless value.  Hand uses only natural materials, in order to respect of our Earth. We also look for established and famous people willing to become the godfathers of Hand.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you so much for whatever form of help: you can talk about Hand to your friends and acquaintances, and give them our web address, you can subscribe to our newsletter, you can like our Facebook Page, or follow us on Twitter and Instagram.

You can invite us to talk about Hand Artis Fabrica in your city, you can organize for us an event, a conference, you can look for sponsors for Hand. You can share this campaign on social networks, you can write to new .

Hand looks for friends and supporters who believe in the values, and in the strenght of the work to realize their dreams.

Whener we would not reach the goal, we’ll use the amount collected to cover the expenditures Hand has sustained till now, in order to realize a new workshop in 2016 and a new collection which will be called Endurance. 
That’s why we’re sure that with perseverance, the dreams based on the good and the love become true.

What We Need & What You Get

The money we are asking for, are necessary to cover all the expenditures sustained till now: 40.000 $ to start to work and buy all the materials; 25.000 $ are needed to rent the exposition space for the Fuori Salone in Milano in the week 14-19 April 2015. 15.000 $ more are needed to deploy an effective communication effort: catalogs for the people who will come to see the collection and to pay good marketing managers to increase the awareness of our brand, our mission and our products. Other 20.000 $ are needed to print a book in 4 languages to recount the Hand adventure and let Hand expand and grow in the whole world.

We need you! If you help us you’ll become our friend and we’ll publish the photo of your hands and of what your hands are able to do on our website, with a story of what your hands can do. You’ll receive handmade bookmark realized by the prisoners, small cadres made by hand by Rokhaya Kamara and if you’ll help us a lot, we’ll gift you an item from the “Intuition” collection, an unique object, full of heart and values which don’t fade as time goes by!


    The Impact

    You become our friend forever and if Hand can help you in something, will do it. We believe in values, and the friendship is a value. 

    Helping weaker people willing to make true the dreams, is helping the world in becoming better. We believe in a world based on substance and values, based on the good and on the hard work, in order to fill the world with harmony and people who help the others. 

    When I quitted the law career to study Caycedian Sophrology the people said me that I was crazy if I left such a safe work for something so different. I didn’t listen to anybody and with commitment, and studying hard, I’ve achieved to realize what I truly wanted to help people who were suffering in their emotional side. Today I’m the Head of the Caycedian Sophrology School of Milano and Roma, and I’m part of a group of 40 active schools in the world, with sophrologysts helping people in healing from depression, eating disorders, and many other problems which make the life impossible.

    The impossible is possible!


      Risks & Challenges

      Little money, many risks, that’s why your help is so important. Hand goes to position itself in an environment, like the art design industry, where if you can spend a lot of money, you can achieve to be well known, paying a big press office to obtain articles on the specialized press. It’s not so easy if you don’t have big bucks. But we have the value of perseverance and we work hard, that’s why we think that all this, that’s new, will be welcome. We use heavily the social networks, whose are a big engine, and we think that thanks to the whole team and the effort we’re making, we’ll make Hand broadly known, as well as itsspapers of your city to made them aware of Hand project.

      You can write us to make us feel that you believe in our project and can send us your love energies and your positive thoughts!!!
